title: EnglishPod 初级 英文播客 0017

segments.en: Hello English learners and welcome back to another episode of EnglishPod.
segments.cn: 你好，英语学习者，欢迎回到另一期的EnglishPod。

segments.en: And today, with Erica, we are getting married.
segments.cn: 今天，和Erica一起，我们要结婚。

segments.en: We're not, but our actors in the podcast are.
segments.cn: 我们不是，但我们播客中的演员要结婚。

segments.en: So we've got a lesson today about weddings.
segments.cn: 所以今天我们有一节关于婚礼的课。

segments.en: A lot of the language in this lesson is about weddings and marriages.
segments.cn: 这节课中的很多语言都是关于婚礼和婚姻的。

segments.en: And maybe you don't need to use this language every day.
segments.cn: 也许你不需要每天使用这些语言。

segments.en: But learning this vocabulary will definitely help you understand or learn a lot more about Anglo culture.
segments.cn: 但学习这些词汇肯定会帮助你更好地理解或了解更多关于英美文化的内容。

segments.en: I think now we can look at our vocabulary preview.
segments.cn: 我想现在我们可以看看我们的词汇预览。

segments.en: So two simple words in this vocabulary preview.
segments.cn: 这个词汇预览中有两个简单的词。

segments.en: Okay, and our second word is... Bride.
segments.cn: 好的，我们的第二个词是……新娘。

segments.en: And obviously the bride is... The woman getting married.
segments.cn: 显然，新娘是……正在结婚的女人。

segments.en: Now we have our bride and our groom.
segments.cn: 现在我们有了新娘和新郎。

segments.en: So it's time to get married.
It's time to listen to our dialogue the first time.
segments.cn: 是时候第一次听我们的对话了。

segments.en: I can't believe that Anthony is finally getting married.
segments.cn: 我真不敢相信安东尼终于要结婚了。

segments.en: He's been living with his parents for 40 years.
Who are those kids walking down the aisle?
segments.cn: 那些孩子是谁在走过过道？

segments.en: That's the flower girl and the ring bearer.
segments.cn: 那是花童和戒指持有者。

segments.en: I'm pretty sure that they're the groom's niece and nephew.
segments.cn: 我很确定他们是新郎的侄女和侄子。

segments.en: I just hope the priest makes it quick.
I hope the food's good at the reception.
segments.cn: 我希望招待会上食物好吃。

segments.en: That's all you ever think about.
Oh, I think the bride's coming now.
Does this mean that the reception is canceled?
segments.cn: 这意味着招待会取消了吗？

segments.en: Oh, well, I mean, the best part is when you go and eat and drink at the reception.
segments.cn: 哦，嗯，我是说，最好的部分是你去招待会上吃喝。

segments.en: Well, there's some great language in this dialogue.
segments.cn: 嗯，这段对话中有一些很棒的语言。

segments.en: And now let's look at our language takeaway.
segments.cn: 现在让我们看看我们的语言要点。

segments.en: Our first word on the language takeaway today is it's about time.
segments.cn: 我们今天语言要点中的第一个词是“终于”。

segments.en: So now we are going to listen to some examples on how we use this great phrase.
segments.cn: 现在我们要听一些例子，看看如何使用这个很棒的短语。

segments.en: You've been unemployed for two years.

segments.cn: 我们已经开了12个小时的车。
所以这个短语的意思是“终于”。

segments.en: We've been waiting a long time for this.
Let's take a look at our second word now.
segments.cn: 现在让我们看看我们的第二个词。

segments.en: It sounds like the contraction of I will.
Yeah, but it's spelled so strangely.
In a big room where you have a lot of chairs, that space in the middle that allows people to walk through, that's the aisle.
segments.cn: 在一个大房间里，很多椅子，中间的空间让人们可以走过，那就是过道。

segments.en: So the aisle is the part where you walk.
segments.cn: 所以过道是你走的部分。

segments.en: The bride and groom walked on the aisle.
segments.cn: 新娘和新郎走在过道上。

segments.en: Let's move to our third word.
segments.cn: 让我们进入第三个单词。

segments.en: Or wait, maybe you should ask me that.
segments.cn: 或者等等，也许你应该问我这个。

segments.en: Yeah, because we don't get bridesmaids.
segments.cn: 是的，因为我们没有伴娘。

segments.en: Okay, so the bridesmaids are the women who are friends of the bride who stand next to her when she's getting married.
segments.cn: 好的，伴娘是新娘的朋友，在她结婚时站在她旁边的女人。
通常她们是她最好的朋友。

segments.en: Okay so we have our bridesmaids, now we have our flower girl.
segments.cn: 好的，所以我们有了伴娘，现在我们有了花童。

segments.en: The flower girl is that cute little girl who walks down the aisle and who throws flowers.
segments.cn: 花童是那个可爱的小女孩，走在过道上，撒花瓣。

segments.en: And with the flower girl, we have our ring bearer.
segments.cn: 和花童一起，我们还有我们的戒指持有者。

segments.en: So the ring bearer is the cute little boy who walks down the aisle carrying the rings.
segments.cn: 所以戒指持有者是那个可爱的小男孩，走在过道上，拿着戒指。

segments.en: Okay, so a lot of useful vocabulary for a wedding ceremony.
segments.cn: 好的，所以有很多有用的婚礼词汇。

segments.en: Now let's look at our last word.
segments.cn: 现在让我们看看最后一个单词。

segments.en: You know, beautiful you can only use with a woman.
segments.cn: 你知道，美丽这个词只能用在女人身上。

segments.en: Can you use gorgeous with a woman or with a man?
segments.cn: 你可以用华丽形容女人或男人吗？

segments.en: So both men and women are gorgeous.
segments.cn: 所以男人和女人都是华丽的。

segments.en: Right, you can say, oh, that girl is gorgeous.
segments.cn: 对，你可以说，哦，那个女孩很华丽。

segments.en: Or you can say even this house is gorgeous.
segments.cn: 或者你甚至可以说这房子很华丽。
好的，所以男人、女人、物体。

segments.en: All right, well, we've learned some really interesting vocabulary that will help us to understand an Anglo wedding.
segments.cn: 好吧，我们学到了一些非常有趣的词汇，这将帮助我们理解英式婚礼。

segments.en: So why don't we listen to the dialogue slowed down?
segments.cn: 那么我们为什么不听一下慢速对话呢？

segments.en: I can't believe that Anthony is finally getting married.
segments.cn: 我真不敢相信安东尼终于要结婚了。

segments.en: He's been living with his parents for 40 years.

segments.cn: 她们的裙子看起来很美。

segments.en: Who are those kids walking down the aisle?
segments.cn: 那些孩子走在过道上是谁？

segments.en: That's the flower girl and the ring bearer.
segments.cn: 那是花童和戒指持有者。

segments.en: I'm pretty sure they're going to get married.
I'm pretty sure they're the groom's niece and nephew.
segments.cn: 我很确定他们是新郎的侄女和侄子。

segments.en: I just hope the priest makes it quick.
I hope the food's good at the reception.
segments.cn: 我希望招待会上食物好。

segments.en: That's all you ever think about food.
Oh, I think the bride's coming now.
Does this mean that the reception is canceled?
segments.cn: 这意味着招待会取消了吗？

segments.en: Now in this dialogue, we have a word that many students often make mistakes on.
segments.cn: 现在在这个对话中，我们有一个很多学生常常出错的词。

segments.en: So this is a word that causes a lot of problems.
segments.cn: 这是一个造成很多问题的词。

segments.en: So we are going to listen now to some common mistakes on how English learners use this word.
segments.cn: 所以我们现在要听一些英语学习者使用这个词的常见错误。

segments.en: Right, so these are wrong examples.
segments.cn: 对，所以这些是错误的例子。

segments.en: When I marry, I want a huge wedding.
segments.cn: 当我结婚时，我想要一个盛大的婚礼。

segments.en: These are great examples of mistakes students make with the word Mary.
segments.cn: 这些都是学生在使用Mary这个词时犯的错误的好例子。

segments.en: Let's listen to these right examples to see what word is missing.
segments.cn: 让我们听听这些正确的例子，看看缺少哪个词。

segments.en: We got married four years ago.
When I get married, I want a huge wedding.
segments.cn: 当我结婚时，我想要一个盛大的婚礼。

segments.en: Great, so we can see that when we use the word Mary, we say to get married.
segments.cn: 很好，所以我们可以看到，当我们使用“Mary”这个词时，我们说的是结婚。

segments.en: So now you know exactly how to use this word.
segments.cn: 所以现在你知道如何使用这个词了。

segments.en: We are ready to listen to our dialogue again for a third time.
segments.cn: 我们准备好再听一次对话，第三次。

segments.en: And this time it's going to be at a normal speed.
I can't believe that Anthony is finally getting married.
segments.cn: 我真不敢相信安东尼终于要结婚了。

segments.en: He's been living with his parents for 40 years.
Who are those kids walking down the aisle?
segments.cn: 那些孩子是谁，走在过道上？

segments.en: That's the flower girl and the rainbearer.
segments.cn: 那是花童和戒指持有者。

segments.en: I'm pretty sure that they're the groom's niece and nephew.
segments.cn: 我很确定他们是新郎的侄女和侄子。

segments.en: I just hope the priest makes it quick.
I hope the food's good at the reception.
segments.cn: 我希望招待会上食物好吃。

segments.en: That's all you ever think about.
Oh, I think the bride's coming now.
Does this mean that the reception is canceled?
segments.cn: 这意味着招待会取消了吗？

segments.en: Okay, well, I'm going to be honest with you.
segments.cn: 好吧，我要诚实地告诉你。

segments.en: I don't know too much about marriages because, first of all, I'm not married.
segments.cn: 我对婚姻了解不多，因为首先，我还没结婚。

segments.en: And I've never really been to many marriages.
segments.cn: 而且我也没参加过很多婚礼。

segments.en: So, Erica, some questions for you.
segments.cn: 所以，埃里卡，我有一些问题要问你。

segments.en: I mean, what are they about?
segments.cn: 我是说，她们的职责是什么？

segments.en: Yeah, what are they doing there?
segments.cn: 是啊，她们在那儿干什么？

segments.en: Well, like I said earlier, the bridesmaids are the friends of the bride.
segments.cn: 嗯，正如我之前所说，伴娘是新娘的朋友。

segments.en: But the most important people, besides the bride and groom, are the best man and the maid of honor.
segments.cn: 但除了新娘和新郎，最重要的人是伴郎和女伴。

segments.en: Okay, and what do they do there in the ceremony?
segments.cn: 好的，她们在仪式上做什么？

segments.en: Well, what they do is they sign the marriage license.
segments.cn: 她们的工作是签署结婚证。
好的，所以她们就像见证人。

segments.en: They sign the marriage license there in the church?
segments.cn: 她们在教堂里签结婚证？

segments.en: Right inside the church you sign the marriage license.
Because, from what I know, in other countries, usually you will sign the marriage license before the ceremony.
segments.cn: 因为据我所知，在其他国家，通常你会在仪式之前签结婚证。

segments.en: Yeah, you have like the civil marriage and then you have like the church wedding or whatever.
segments.cn: 是的，你有民事婚姻，然后还有教堂婚礼或其他什么。

segments.en: Well, yeah, I mean the church wedding is just a ceremony.
segments.cn: 嗯，是的，我是说教堂婚礼只是一个仪式。

segments.en: Oh, in Canada it's the official part as well.
segments.cn: 哦，在加拿大也是官方部分。

segments.en: I guess maybe you're just more efficient.
segments.cn: 我想也许你们只是更高效。

segments.en: Well, this is a really fascinating, a really interesting subject, isn't it?
segments.cn: 嗯，这真是一个迷人而有趣的话题，不是吗？

segments.en: Yeah, because there are so many countries that have different marriage ceremonies.
segments.cn: 是啊，因为有很多国家有不同的婚礼仪式。

segments.en: I know that marriages in India last around seven days.
segments.cn: 我知道印度的婚礼持续大约七天。

segments.en: I want to know more about how our users get married in their country.
segments.cn: 我想知道我们的用户在他们的国家是如何结婚的。

segments.en: Yeah, so please go to our website at EnglishPod.com and tell us how you get married in your countries.
segments.cn: 是啊，请访问我们的网站 EnglishPod.com，告诉我们你们在各自国家是如何结婚的。

segments.en: Yeah, I can't wait to hear your stories.
segments.cn: 是啊，我迫不及待想听你们的故事。

segments.en: Yeah, it should be interesting, right?
segments.cn: 是啊，这应该很有趣，对吧？

segments.en: Well, everyone thanks for listening and until next time, goodbye.
segments.cn: 好吧，感谢大家的收听，直到下次，再见。
